stark_settings.description: Input parameters for the IDL STARK code

beam.description: Contains data relevant to the Neutral Beam that is reasonably fixed.

xyz.description: The xyz-coordinates - in the machine coordinate system - of the beam duct

xidelta.description: The angle between the projection of the beam axis in the xy-plane and the x-axis. And the angle between the beam axis and the z-axis)

dS.description: Distance from the beam source (PINI) to the beam duct.8.2200391574

focus.description: Horizontal and vertical focus of the beam, measured from the beam source

pinifile.description: Name of the file that contains the coordinates of the Octant 4 NBI PINI1 beamlets.

div.description: Half 1/e width of the divergence of the beamlets. 5 milliradians #0.5

w.description: The half sampling width of the beam. This means that the maximum distance from the integration points to the beam axis is w. In case no beam-file is defined, w is also the full 1/e -width of the calculated Gaussian beam profile.

mass.description: Mass number of the neutral beam particles (1=H, 2=D, 3=T).

Vmod_type.description: Type of beam voltage modulation (0=none, 1=square, 2=triangle, 3=sine, 4=from file).

Vmod_amp.description: Peak-to-Peak amplitude of the beam voltage modulation.

Vmod_n.description: Number of sampling points for the beam voltage modulation.

Vmod_file.description: File containing the histogram or probability distribution of the beam modulation/ripple. It is a simple text file with in a first column the ripple voltages (with respect to the nominal voltage) and in a second column their probability. The number records/lines gives the number of sampling points for the beam voltage modulation.

Qion.description: Ionisation rate of beam particles per unit of length (only used if the beam file is set to 'none').

Qemit.description: Emission rate of beam particles per s (only used if the beam file is set to 'none').
